name: The Exhibition
description:
Creation from Michel Bertrand, digital abstractionist from France. 


I create artworks to express my emotions and make people think about becoming a better version of themselves.


Sometimes I like blending figurative and abstract worlds.
In this work, I've approached the design of the main protagonists in an "art nouveau" style like a modern re-interpretation of the work from Théo Van Rysselberghe.


When you exhibit your work or your true self, you open your soul to the rest of the world. I wish everyone could experience this mental exercise as the more you go out of your comfort zone, the better version of yourself you become. This is what I'd like to remember the viewer with this creation.


 "I believe in clean NFTs and love the Tezos community."


Michel Bertrand


https://twitter.com/michelabstract

This artwork is a PNG file measuring 2000 x 2000 pixels
